text: Goniothalamus gardneri is a species of plant in the Annonaceae family. It is endemic to Sri Lanka. ==Culture== Known as ක‍ටු කෙර (katu kera) in Sinhala. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Goniothalamus gardneri. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007. Category:Flora of Sri Lanka gardneri Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Goniothalamus gardneri
